title: Suffering Jesus

tokens.lyric: See Lord Jesus bent in prayer, in the garden late at night,

lines.raw: [Cm]See Lord Jesus bent in prayer, in the garden late at night,

tokens.lyric: See Lord Jesus bent in prayer, in the garden late at night.

lines.raw: [Gm]See Lord Jesus bent in prayer, in the garden late at night.

tokens.lyric: See Him crying sweating blood watch it mingle with His tears;

lines.raw: [Dm]See Him crying sweating blood watch it mingle with His tears;

tokens.lyric: Twelve disciples all asleep, even Peter nods and snores.

lines.raw: [Cm]Twelve disciples all asleep, even Peter nods and snores.

tokens.lyric: Iscariot comes with a kiss, hands Him over He is
betrayed.

lines.raw: [G]Iscariot comes with a kiss, hands Him over He is [G7]betrayed.

tokens.lyric: How could it be? Tragic sight innocent Lord precious Lord.

lines.raw: [Cm]How could it be? Tragic sight innocent Lord precious Lord.

tokens.lyric: Twelve disciples watch from afar, everyone is running away.

lines.raw: [Cm]Twelve disciples watch from afar, everyone is running away.

tokens.lyric: Jesus alone captured and chained; soldiers lead Him to the prison.

lines.raw: [Bm7]Jesus alone captured and chained; soldiers lead Him to the prison.

tokens.lyric: Frightened Peter runs from the scene; with his tunic hides his face;

lines.raw: [Cm]Frightened Peter runs from the scene; with his tunic hides his face;

tokens.lyric: Look at Peter treacherous man, now pretends he does not
know.

lines.raw: [Fm]Look at Peter treacherous man, now pretends he does not [Cm]know.

tokens.lyric: He who made the lame leap for joy, He who made the blind man see,

lines.raw: [Fm]He who made the lame leap for joy, He who made the blind man see,

tokens.lyric: He who freely walked on the waves, where are all those miracles now?

lines.raw: [G7]He who freely walked on the waves, where are all those miracles now?

tokens.lyric: See Lord Jesus bent in shame, see Him bear His heavy cross,

lines.raw: [Cm]See Lord Jesus bent in shame, see Him bear His heavy cross,

tokens.lyric: See Lord Jesus bent in shame, see Him bear His heavy cross.

lines.raw: [Bm7]See Lord Jesus bent in shame, see Him bear His heavy cross.

tokens.lyric: Spent, exhausted, body and soul, now He stumbles and He falls;

lines.raw: [Cm]Spent, exhausted, body and soul, now He stumbles and He falls;

tokens.lyric: Whipped from behind, driven along, Jesus treated just like a cow,

lines.raw: [Gm]Whipped from behind, driven along, Jesus treated just like a cow,

tokens.lyric: Where are His men? Where are the twelve? Jesus now is standing alone.

lines.raw: [Dm]Where are His men? Where are the twelve? Jesus now is standing alone.

tokens.lyric: Not even one man is there bearing the cross for his Lord.

lines.raw: [Cm]Not even one man is there bearing the cross for his Lord.

tokens.lyric: Tho' the crowd may pity a thief, freeing sinful men of this world,

lines.raw: [G]Tho' the crowd may pity a thief, freeing sinful men of this world,

tokens.lyric: Who'd volunteer to take His place, take the cross for God's son Jesus?

lines.raw: [G7]Who'd volunteer to take His place, take the cross for God's son Jesus?

tokens.lyric: How very sad, how very sad, mighty Father shedding tears;

lines.raw: [Cm]How very sad, how very sad, mighty Father shedding tears;

tokens.lyric: Lost and betrayed, lost and betrayed, all the Father's hopes are gone.

lines.raw: [Gm]Lost and betrayed, lost and betrayed, all the Father's hopes are gone.

tokens.lyric: Even the most ignorant men have a shred of common sense;

lines.raw: [Dm]Even the most ignorant men have a shred of common sense;

tokens.lyric: Who can see the Father's despair, who can share His suffering pain?

lines.raw: [Cm]Who can see the Father's despair, who can share His suffering pain?

tokens.lyric: See Lord Jesus on the cross, nails are hammered through His hands,

lines.raw: [G]See Lord Jesus on the cross, nails are hammered through His hands,

tokens.lyric: See Lord Jesus on the cross, nails are hammered through His hands.

lines.raw: [G7]See Lord Jesus on the cross, nails are hammered through His hands.

tokens.lyric: What kind of sin did He commit, this, the only Son of God?

lines.raw: [Cm]What kind of sin did He commit, this, the only Son of God?

tokens.lyric: Like a pure innocent sheep, He is dying, dying for you.

lines.raw: [Fm]Like a pure innocent sheep, He is dying, dying for you.

tokens.lyric: Father above He cannot watch; When He turns His face from His Son.

lines.raw: [Cm]Father above He cannot watch; When He turns His face from His Son.

tokens.lyric: "My God, my God" Jesus cries "Why do you now forsake me?"

lines.raw: [G7]"My God, my God" Jesus cries "Why do you now forsake me?"

tokens.lyric: Twelve disciples shared all His ways, still were deaf and blind to His heart

lines.raw: [Cm]Twelve disciples shared all His ways, still were deaf and blind to His heart

tokens.lyric: All gone to waste, all gone to waste, Providence of God is broken

lines.raw: [Bm7]All gone to waste, all gone to waste, Providence of God is broken

tokens.lyric: No use now to cry and repent, all repentance comes too late.

lines.raw: [Cm]No use now to cry and repent, all repentance comes too late.

tokens.lyric: To prepare His coming again, sacrifices must be found.

lines.raw: [G]To prepare His coming again, sacrifices must be found.

tokens.lyric: All the faithful shedding their blood, spilling for two thousand years.

lines.raw: [G7]All the faithful shedding their blood, spilling for two thousand years.

tokens.lyric: All this bloodshed, salvation's price, for three billion men of today.

lines.raw: [Cm]All this bloodshed, salvation's price, for three billion men of today.
